T06TD4038.2E:45b-0: glang po che'i tshogs kyi rnam grangs kyi 'du shes 'byung @45b ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-4: bang ba'i tshogs kyi bar gyi 'du shes dang /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-5: de dag gi rnam grangs kyi 'du shes 'byung ba'i sgyu ma byas pa 'di ni yod do //
T06TD4038.2E:45b-6: mig slu bar byed pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-7: de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-8: ji ltar thos pa bzhin du de dag la nan gyis mchog tu gzung zhing mngon par zhen nas /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-9: 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun no zhes rjes su tha snyad mi 'dogs kyi /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-10: 'di ltar don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed de /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-11: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtags par bya mi dgos pa yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:45b-12: de bzhin du sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-13: so so'i skye bor gyur ba /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-14: shes rab 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ma thob pa chos thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i chos nyid mngon par mi shes pa de dag ni 'dus byas dang 'das ma byas de dag mthong ngam thos nas 'di snyam du sems te /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-15: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas snang ba gang yin ba 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-16: ji ltar thos pa bzhin du de dag la nan gyis mchog tu gzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di ni bden gyi /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-17: gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par yang byed do //
T06TD4038.2E:45b-18: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya dgos pa yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:45b-19: de la sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-21: shes rab 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa thob pa /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-22: chos thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i chos nyid mngon par shes pa de dag ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas de dag mthong ngam thos na 'di snyam du sems te /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-23: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas snang ba gang yin pa de ni med kyi /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-24: gang la 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes dang /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-25: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi rnam grangs kyi 'du shes 'byung ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-26: rnam par rtog pa las byung ba 'du byed kyi mtshan ma sgyu ma lta bu 'di ni yod do //
T06TD4038.2E:45b-27: blo rnam par rmongs par byed pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-28: de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:45b-29: ji ltar thos pa bzhin du /
T06TD4038.2E:46a-0: de la nan gyis mchog tu gzung zhing mngon par zhen @46a * //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-2: gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad mi 'dogs kyi /
T06TD4038.2E:46a-3: 'di ltar don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed de /
T06TD4038.2E:46a-4: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya mi dgos pa yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-5: rigs kyi bu de ltar na 'phags pa rnams kyi dngos po de 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'phags pa'i mthong bas rjes su brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-6: brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas zhes ming du btags pa yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' don zab dgongs pa nges par 'grel gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-8: zab mo byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-9: brjod med gnyis min rgyal bas bstan mdzad kyang //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-10: byis pa gti mug rmongs pa 'di dag ni //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-11: smra pa'i spros la dga' zhing gnyis la gnas //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-12: ma rtogs pa'am log par rtog pa dag //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-13: lug dang ba lang dag tu yang skye zhing //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-14: de dag shes pa'i smra ba de ber nas //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-17: de la rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin blta bar bya ste /
T06TD4038.2E:46a-18: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
T06TD4038.2E:46a-19: bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi dus rnams kyi shin tu snga ba zhig na /
T06TD4038.2E:46a-20: 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na /
T06TD4038.2E:46a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya chen gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams grags pa can zhes bgyi ba der bdag mchis pa'i tshe /
T06TD4038.2E:46a-22: de na bdag gis mu stegs can rang rang gi ston pa la sogs pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun 'di lta ste /
T06TD4038.2E:46a-23: chos rnams kyi don dam pa'i mtshan nyid bsams pa las brtsams nas /
T06TD4038.2E:46a-24: sa phyogs zhig na mchis shing 'dus nas /
T06TD4038.2E:46a-25: de dag chos rnams kyi don dam pa'i mtshan nyid sems par bgyid //
T06TD4038.2E:46b-0: yongs su @46b tshol bar bgyid kyang ma rtogs nas //
T06TD4038.2E:46b-5: 'gyed par gyur pa dag / gcig la gcig kha stobs kyis gnod pa bgyis //
T06TD4038.2E:46b-7: gab gab kyis gnon pa bgyis //
T06TD4038.2E:46b-9: so sor mchis pa dag cig mthong nas //
T06TD4038.2E:46b-10: bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
T06TD4038.2E:46b-11: kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung zhing //
T06TD4038.2E:46b-12: de dag byung bas don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta bu rtog pa dang mngon sum du bgyi ba mchis pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so snyam bgyid lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:46b-13: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:46b-15: byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T06TD4038.2E:46b-18: ngas ni don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
T06TD4038.2E:46b-19: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bsnyad cing gsal bar byas //
T06TD4038.2E:46b-24: don dam pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi so so rang gis rig pa yin par ngas bshad la /
T06TD4038.2E:46b-25: so so'i skye bo rnams kyi phan tshun rig par bya ba ni rtog ge'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir te /
T06TD4038.2E:46b-26: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de na don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:46b-27: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul yin par ngas bshad la /
T06TD4038.2E:46b-28: rtog ge ni mtshan ma'i spyod yul yin te /
T06TD4038.2E:46b-29: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:46b-30: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni brjod du med pa yin par ngas bshad la /
T06TD4038.2E:46b-31: rtog ge ni brjod pa'i spyod yul yin te /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-0: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams @47a * //
T06TD4038.2E:47a-1: cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:47a-2: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin par ngas bshad la /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-3: rtog ge ni tha snyad kyi spyod yul yin te /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-4: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:47a-5: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni rtsod pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin par ngas bshad la /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-6: rtog ge ni rtsod pa'i spyod yul yin te /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-7: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:47a-9: dper na skyes bu gang zag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tsha ba dang kha ba'i ro bsten bsten pas ni sprang rtsi'i ro 'am /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-10: sha kha ra'i ro brtag pa'am /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-13: yun ring po nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la mos pa dang 'dod pa'i yongs su gdung ba dag gis yongs su gdungs pas ni nang gi rab tu dben pa'i bde ba gzugs dang /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-17: reg bya'i mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba la brtag pa'am /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-20: yun ring po nas kun tu smra ba la mos pa kun tu smra ba la mngon par dga' bas ni nang gi mi smra ba 'phags pa'i bden pa la brtag pa'am /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-23: yun ring po nas mthong ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-26: rnam par shes pa'i tha snyad la mos pa /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-27: tha snyad la mngon par dga' bas ni tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa 'jig tshogs la 'gog pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la brtag pa'am /
T06TD4038.2E:47a-31: dper na yun ring po nas bdag gir yongs su 'dzin pa nyid kyis rtsod pa la brtson pa /
T06TD4038.2E:47b-0: rtsod pa la mngon par dga' bas ni byang gi @47b sgra mi snyan pa dag gis bdag gir yongs su 'dzin pa med pa nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:47b-1: rtsod pa med pa nyid la brtag pa'am /
T06TD4038.2E:47b-4: chos 'phags de bzhin du rtog ge ba thams cad kyis kyang don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid la brtag pa'am /
T06TD4038.2E:47b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
T06TD4038.2E:47b-8: so so rang rig mtshan med spyod yul te //
T06TD4038.2E:47b-9: brjod du med cing tha snyad yongs chad pa //
T06TD4038.2E:47b-10: rtsod dang bral ba don dam chos yin te //
T06TD4038.2E:47b-11: de ni rtog ge kun las 'das mtshan nyid //
T06TD4038.2E:47b-13: de la tha dad pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:47b-14: tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste //
T06TD4038.2E:47b-15: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros shin tu rnam dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
T06TD4038.2E:47b-16: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi slad du 'di skad ces don dam pa ni phra ba zab pa tha dad pa dang tha dad pa nyid ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par dka' ba yin no zhes bka' stsal te /
T06TD4038.2E:47b-17: ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:47b-18: bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gis phyogs shig na /
T06TD4038.2E:47b-19: byang chub sems dpa' mos pas spyod pa'i sa la bzhugs pa rab tu mang po dag cig 'di lta ste /
T06TD4038.2E:47b-21: don dam pa tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma lags pa nyid bsams pa las brtsams te /
T06TD4038.2E:47b-22: phan tshun nas mchis shing mchis nas 'dus te mchis nas /
T06TD4038.2E:47b-23: de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma lags so zhes mchi /
T06TD4038.2E:47b-24: kha cig ni 'di skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma lags pa ma lags kyi //
T06TD4038.2E:47b-25: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa lags so zhes mchi /
T06TD4038.2E:48a-0: the tshom du gyur pa'i blo gros can yid gnyis su @48a * //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-1: gyur pa kha cig ni 'di skad du //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-2: gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa lags so zhes mchi ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:48a-3: gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma lags so zhes mchi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gang ni mang par mchi ba lags //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-4: gang ni sho be mchi ba lags //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-5: gang ni tshul bzhin du zhugs pa lags //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-6: gang ni tshul bzhin ma lags par zhugs pa lags zhes mchi bdag cig mthong lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-7: bcom ldan 'das mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
T06TD4038.2E:48a-8: rigs kyi bu 'di dag thams cad ni 'di ltar don dam pa 'du byed rnams dang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma lags pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid phra ba ma 'tshal ba //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-9: byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba /
T06TD4038.2E:48a-11: tshul bzhin ma lags par zhugs pa sha stag lags so snyam bgyid lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-12: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:48a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros shin tu rnam dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-14: blo gros shin tu rnam dag de de bzhin no //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-16: rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni 'di ltar don dam pa 'du byed rnams dang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid phra ba mi shes pa /
T06TD4038.2E:48a-21: tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa sha stag yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-23: blo gros shin tu rnam dag 'du byed rnams la de ltar so sor rtog pa dag ni don dam pa rtog pa'am /
T06TD4038.2E:48a-24: don dam pa mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-26: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin par gyur na ni des na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad bden pa mthong ba yin par yang 'gyur //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-27: so so'i skye bo kho nar 'gyur bzhin du grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par yang 'gyur //
T06TD4038.2E:48a-28: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-0: gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid @48b las don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin par gyur na ni des na bden pa mthong ba rnams kyang //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-1: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dang ma bral bar 'gyur //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-2: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dang ma bral ba'i phyir bden pa mthong ba yang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol bar yang mi 'gyur //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-3: mtshan ma'i 'ching ba las rnam par ma grol na gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba las kyang rnam par ma grol bar 'gyur //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-4: 'ching ba de gnyis las ma grol na bden ba mthong bas grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par yang mi 'gyur //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-6: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gang gi phyir so so'i skye bo bden pa mthong ba ma yin //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-7: so so'i skye bo kho nar 'gyur bzhin du grub pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:48b-8: bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par yang mi 'gyur /
T06TD4038.2E:48b-9: bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-10: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes byar mi rung ste /
T06TD4038.2E:48b-11: de la gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na /
T06TD4038.2E:48b-12: khyod kyis 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-13: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-14: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gang gi phyir bden pa mthong ba rnams 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba ma yin gyi /
T06TD4038.2E:48b-15: bral ba kho na yin pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:48b-16: bden pa mthong ba mtshan ma'i 'ching ba las rnam par ma grol ba ma yin gyi //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-17: rnam par grol ba yin pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:48b-18: bden pa mthong ba gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba las rnam par ma grol ba ma yin gyi //
T06TD4038.2E:48b-19: rnam par grol ba yin pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:48b-20: 'ching ba de gnyi ga las rnam par grol na grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:48b-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ba de'i phyir //
T06TD4038.2E:49a-0: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes byar @49a * //
T06TD4038.2E:49a-2: de la gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na /
T06TD4038.2E:49a-3: khyod kyis 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi /
T06TD4038.2E:49a-4: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:49a-5: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gzhan yang gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin par gyur na ni //
T06TD4038.2E:49a-6: des na ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du gtogs pa de bzhin du don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du gtogs par 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:49a-7: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:49a-8: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin par gyur na yang des na 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams cad la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni spyi'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:49a-9: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gang gi phyir don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du gtogs pa ma yin pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:49a-10: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams cad la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid spyi'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de'i phyir //
T06TD4038.2E:49a-11: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes byar yang mi rung la /
T06TD4038.2E:49a-12: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes byar yang mi rung ste /
T06TD4038.2E:49a-13: de la gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:49a-14: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes zer ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:49a-15: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na /
T06TD4038.2E:49a-16: khyod kyis 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi //
T06TD4038.2E:49a-17: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ni ma yin par rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:49a-18: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gzhan yang gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin par gyur na ni //

T06TD4038.2E:49a-23: ji ltar bye brag phyed pa dang /

T06TD4038.2E:49b-16: tha dad pa zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na /
T06TD4038.2E:49b-17: khyod kyi 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi //
T06TD4038.2E:49b-18: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:49b-19: blo gros shin tu rnam dag 'di lta ste /

T06TD4038.2E:49b-21: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no //

T06TD4038.2E:49b-23: gser gyi ser po nyid kyang de bzhin no //
T06TD4038.2E:49b-24: pi wang gi sgra'i snyan pa nyid kyang pi wang gi sgra nyid dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
T06TD4038.2E:49b-25: mtshan nyid tha dad par gdags par sla ba ma yin no //

T06TD4038.2E:49b-27: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:49b-28: na le sham gyi tsha ba nyid kyang na le sham dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
T06TD4038.2E:49b-29: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:50a-0: na le sham gyi tsha ba nyid ji ltar ba bzhin du aa ru ra'i bska ba nyid kyang de bzhin @50a * //
T06TD4038.2E:50a-3: dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'i 'jam pa nyid kyang shing bal gyi 'da' ba dang mtshan nyid tha pa ma yin pa'am //
T06TD4038.2E:50a-4: mtshan nyid tha dad par gdags par sla ba ma yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:50a-6: dper na mar la mar gyi snying khu yang mar dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
T06TD4038.2E:50a-7: mtshan nyid tha dad par gdags par sla ba ma yin no //

T06TD4038.2E:50a-16: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:50a-17: 'dod chags kyi ji lta ba bzhin du zhe sdang dang gti mug gi yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:50a-18: blo gros shin tu rnam dag de bzhin du 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
T06TD4038.2E:50a-19: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par mi bzod do //

T06TD4038.2E:50a-26: mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /

T06TD4038.2E:50a-29: gdags pa byas rab tu bstan to //

T06TD4038.2E:50a-32: gcig dang tha dad bral ba'i mtshan nyid de //
T06TD4038.2E:50a-33: gcig dang tha dad nyid du gang rtog pa /
T06TD4038.2E:50a-34: de dag tshul bzhin ma yin zhugs pa yin //
T06TD4038.2E:50a-35: skye ba po yis lhag mthong dang /
T06TD4038.2E:50a-36: zhi gnas goms par byas nas ni //
T06TD4038.2E:50a-37: gnas ngan len gyi mching ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:50b-2: de la thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan par rab 'bor la bka' stsal pa //
T06TD4038.2E:50b-3: rab 'byor khyod kyis sems can gyi khams na /
T06TD4038.2E:50b-4: gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing //

T06TD4038.2E:50b-6: khyod kyis sems can gyi khams na /
T06TD4038.2E:50b-7: gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par shes pa brda sprod par byed pa'i sems can ji tsam zhig yod par shes /
T06TD4038.2E:50b-9: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can gyi khams na gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis par shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa'i sems can ni nyung shas cig mchis par 'tshal ba lags kyi //
T06TD4038.2E:50b-10: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can gyi khams na /
T06TD4038.2E:50b-11: gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal can /

T06TD4038.2E:50b-14: brjod du ma mchis pa snyed cig mchis par 'tshal lags te /
T06TD4038.2E:50b-15: bcom ldan 'das bdag dus gcig gis na /
T06TD4038.2E:50b-16: dgon pa nags khrod chen po zhig na mchis pa'i tshe /
T06TD4038.2E:50b-17: de na bdag gi nye 'khor na dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig kyang dgon pa nags khrod chen po na brten cing gnas lags te /
T06TD4038.2E:50b-18: bdag gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe //
T06TD4038.2E:50b-19: dge slong de dag phan tshun nas mchis shing mjal nas chos rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ston pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid de //
T06TD4038.2E:50b-20: de na kha cig ni phung po dmigs pa dang /

T06TD4038.2E:51a-29: kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du /
T06TD4038.2E:51a-30: kha cig ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /
T06TD4038.2E:51a-31: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
T06TD4038.2E:51a-34: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /

T06TD4038.2E:51b-16: 'di las slad rol pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
T06TD4038.2E:51b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

T06TD4038.2E:51b-25: mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba /

T06TD4038.2E:52a-13: rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa ni phung po gcig gi de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa rab tu rtogs nas /
T06TD4038.2E:52a-14: yang de las gzhan pa'i phung po rnams dang /
T06TD4038.2E:52a-17: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang /
T06TD4038.2E:52a-20: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /
T06TD4038.2E:52a-21: yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /
T06TD4038.2E:52a-22: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /

T06TD4038.2E:52a-26: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa so so la de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed kyi /

T06TD4038.2E:52a-29: mngon par rtogs pa kho nar byed de /
T06TD4038.2E:52a-30: rab 'byor rnams grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:52a-31: rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar phung po dang /
T06TD4038.2E:52a-37: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:52a-38: yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /

T06TD4038.2E:52b-4: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin pa de bzhin du /
T06TD4038.2E:52b-5: gal te chos de dag gi de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yang mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin par gyur na ni des na de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yang rgyu dang bcas pa yin zhing mtshan nyid rgyu las byung ba yin par 'gyur ro //

T06TD4038.2E:52b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
T06TD4038.2E:52b-15: rtag gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /

T06TD4038.2E:52b-21: dper na nam mkha' ni gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs du ma mtshan nyid tha dad pa la /

T06TD4038.2E:52b-23: thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //

T06TD4038.2E:52b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
T06TD4038.2E:52b-26: don dam de ni tha dad pa ma yin te //
T06TD4038.2E:52b-27: kun tu ro gcig mtshan nyid sangs rgyas gsungs //

T06TD4038.2E:52b-32: // / bam po sum cu brgyad pa /

T06TD4038.2E:56b-12: rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la /

T06TD4038.2E:56b-14: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rab tu spong zhing /
T06TD4038.2E:56b-15: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rab tu spangs nas /
T06TD4038.2E:56b-16: rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos 'thob par 'gyur ba de tsam gyis na /
T06TD4038.2E:56b-17: byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa yin la /
T06TD4038.2E:56b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas par 'dogs par mdzad pa na yang de tsam gyis 'dogs par mdzad do //
T06TD4038.2E:56b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
T06TD4038.2E:56b-20: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos ni rab shes na //
T06TD4038.2E:56b-21: kun nas nyon mongs pa mtshan nyid chos spong 'gyur //
T06TD4038.2E:56b-22: kun nas nyon mongs chos ni rab spangs na //
T06TD4038.2E:56b-23: shin tu rnam dag mtshan nyid chos 'thob 'gyur //
T06TD4038.2E:56b-24: skye bo bag med nyes rtsom le lo can //
T06TD4038.2E:56b-25: 'du byed skyon la rtog par mi byed pa //
T06TD4038.2E:56b-26: brtan med g-yo ba med pa'i chos rnams la //
T06TD4038.2E:56b-27: rab tu nyams pas snying brtser byas pa yin //
T06TD4038.2E:57a-0: de la chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba'i @57a * //
T06TD4038.2E:57a-1: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-2: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
T06TD4038.2E:57a-3: bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gcig pu dben pa zhig na mchis pa'i tshe /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-4: sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes lags te /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar phung po rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyang bka' stsal /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-9: yongs su shes pa yang bka' stsal /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-10: phung po rnams kyi ji lta ba de bzhin du skye mched rnams dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-12: zas rnams kyi yang bka' stsal /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar bden pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyang bka' stsal /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar khams rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyang bka' stsal /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-19: khams sna tshogs pa nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-20: khams du ma pa nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-22: yongs su shes pa yang bka' stsal /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyang bka' stsal /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-26: ma skyes pa rnams skye ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-27: skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-30: 'phel zhing yangs pa nyid kyang bka' stsal ;
T06TD4038.2E:57a-31: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-32: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-35: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang bka' stsal /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyang bka' stsal /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-40: ma skyes pa rnams skye ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57a-41: skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-0: 'phel zhing yangs pa nyid @57b kyang bka' stsal /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-2: chos thams cad ma skyes pa /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-4: gzod ma nas zhi ba rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang bka' stsal lags na /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas ;
T06TD4038.2E:57b-6: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-7: chos thams cad ma skyes pa /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-10: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bka' stsal snyam bgyid lags te /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-12: chos thams cad ma skyes pa /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-15: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bka' stsal ba'i don de nyid /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-16: bcom ldan 'das la bdag yongs su zhu lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:57b-17: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T06TD4038.2E:57b-20: khyod kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa dge ba tshul bzhin skyes pa legs so //
T06TD4038.2E:57b-22: don dam yang dag 'phags khyod de ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-23: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-24: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-25: lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i don dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-26: phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod don 'di nyid 'dri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legs so //
T06TD4038.2E:57b-28: don dam yang dag 'phags de'i phyir khyod nyon cig dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-29: ngas ci las dgongs nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-30: chos thams cad ma skyes pa /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-33: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsungs pa khyod la bshad par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:57b-34: don dam yang dag 'phags ngas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med pa nyid rnam pa gsum po 'di lta ste /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-35: mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-36: skye bo ngo bo med pa nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:57b-37: don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las dgongs nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o zhes bstan to //
T06TD4038.2E:58a-1: 'phags de la chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid gang zhe na /
T06TD4038.2E:58a-2: kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa'o //
T06TD4038.2E:58a-4: 'di ltar de ni ming dang brdar rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa ni ma yin pas ;
T06TD4038.2E:58a-5: de'i phyir de ni mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid ces bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:58a-6: don dam yang dag 'phags chos rnams kyi skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa nyid gang zhe na /
T06TD4038.2E:58a-7: chos rnams kyi gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'o //
T06TD4038.2E:58a-9: 'di ltar de ni rkyen gzhan gyi stobs kyis byung ba yin gyi bdag nyid kyis ni ma yin pas de'i phyir de ni skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa nyid ces bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:58a-10: don dam yang dag 'phags chos rnams kyi don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid gang zhe na /
T06TD4038.2E:58a-11: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos gang dag skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid med pa yang yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:58a-13: don dam pa yang dag 'phags chos rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni ngas don dam pa yin par yongs su bstan la /
T06TD4038.2E:58a-14: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid de ni rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa ma yin pas /
T06TD4038.2E:58a-15: de'i phyir don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid ces bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:58a-16: don dam yang dag 'phags gzhan yang chos rnams kyi yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de yang don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid ces bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:58a-18: don dam yang dag 'phags chos rnams kyi chos bdag med pa gang yin pa de ni de dag gi ngo bo nyid med pa nyid ces bya ste /
T06TD4038.2E:58a-19: de ni don dam pa yin la /
T06TD4038.2E:58a-20: don dam pa ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin pas /
T06TD4038.2E:58a-21: de'i phyir don dam pa ngo bo nyid ces bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:58a-22: don dam yang dag 'phags de la 'di lta ste /
T06TD4038.2E:58a-23: dper na nam mkha'i me tog ji lta ba de lta bur ni mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid blta bar bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:58a-24: don dam pa yang dag 'phags de la 'di lta ste /
T06TD4038.2E:58a-25: dper na sgyu ma byas pa ji lta ba de lta bur ni skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyang blta bar bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:58b-0: don @58b dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid de las kyang gcig blta bar bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:58b-1: don dam yang dag 'phags de la 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid med pa nyid tsam gyis rab tu phye ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-2: thams cad du song ba ji lta ba de lta bur ni don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid de las chos bdag med par rab tu phye ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-3: thams cad du song ba gcig blta bar bya ste /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-4: don dam yang dag pa 'phags ngas ngo bo nyid med pa nyid rnam pa gsum po de dag las dgongs nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o zhes bstan to //
T06TD4038.2E:58b-5: don dam yang dag 'phags de la mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las dgongs nas /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-6: ngas chos thams cad ma skyes pa /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-9: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bstan to //
T06TD4038.2E:58b-11: don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis med pa gang yin pa de ni ma skyes pa yin /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-12: ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni ma 'gags pa yin /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-13: ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa gang yin pa de ni gzod ma nas zhi ba yin /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-14: gzod ma nas zhi ba gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-15: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba cung zad kyang med do //
T06TD4038.2E:58b-16: de'i phyir mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las dgongs nas /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-17: ngas chos thams cad ma skyes pa /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-19: gzod ma nas zhig / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bstan to //
T06TD4038.2E:58b-20: don dam yang dag 'phags yang don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid chos bdag med pas rab tu phye ba las dgongs nas /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-21: ngas chos thams cad ma skyes pa /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-24: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bstan to //
T06TD4038.2E:58b-26: 'di ltar don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid chos bdag med pas rab tu phye ba ni rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang /
T06TD4038.2E:58b-27: ther zug ther zug gi dus su rnam par gnas pa kho na yin la /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-0: de ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'dus ma byas pa nyon mongs pa @59a * //
T06TD4038.2E:59a-1: thams cad dang bral ba yin te /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-2: rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-3: ther zug ther zug gi dus su chos nyid de nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-4: 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus pa ma byas pa'i phyir ma skyes pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-6: de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-7: gzod ma nas zhi ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-8: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin te /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-9: de'i phyir don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid chos bdag med pas rab tu phye ba las dgongs nas /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-10: ngas chos thams cad ma skyes pa /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-13: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bstan to //
T06TD4038.2E:59a-14: don dam yang dag 'phags nga ni sems can gyi khams na sems can rnams kyi kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyis tha dad par mthong zhing /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-15: gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-16: yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang ngo bo nyid kyis tha dad par mthong ba de'i phyir ngo bo nyid med pa nyid rnam pa gsum mi 'dogs kyi /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-17: sems can rnams gzhan gyi dbang dang /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-18: yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-19: kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid du sgro btags nas /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-20: gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-21: kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-22: ji lta ji ltar rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad btags pas yongs su bsgos pa'i sems tha snyad btags pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'am /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-23: tha snyad btags pa bag la nyal gyis gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-24: kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen to //
T06TD4038.2E:59a-25: ji lta ji ltar mngon par zhen pa de lta de ltar gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid la /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-26: kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par zhen pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen des phyi ma la gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid kun tu skyed de /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-27: gzhi des na nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pas kyang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-28: las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:59a-29: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pas kyang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur zhing /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-0: yun ring por @59b yang na sems can dmyal ba rnams sam /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-2: yang na yi dvags rnams sam /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-4: yang na lha ma yin rnams sam /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-5: yang na mi rnams kyi nang du kun tu rgyug cing 'khor bar 'gyur te /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-6: 'khor ba las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
T06TD4038.2E:59b-7: don dam yang dag 'phags de la sems can gang dag dang po nyid nas /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-9: sgrib pa yongs su ma dag pa /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-10: rgyud yongs su ma smin pa /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-12: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par ma grub pa de dag la ni da skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las brtsams nas chos ston te //
T06TD4038.2E:59b-13: de dag gis chos de thos nas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'du byed rnams la mi rtag pa nyid du 'du shes shing /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-15: yid brtan du mi rung ba nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-16: 'gyur ba'i chos can nyid du shes nas /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-17: 'du byed thams cad la yid dang bar byed do //
T06TD4038.2E:59b-20: skyo bar byas nas sdig pa las phyir ldog ste /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-21: de dag sdig pa gang yin pa de mi byed cing dge ba la brten par byed do //
T06TD4038.2E:59b-22: dge ba la brten pa'i rgyus dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni skyed do //
T06TD4038.2E:59b-23: sgrib pa yongs su ma byang ba rnams kyang yongs su sbyong ngo //
T06TD4038.2E:59b-24: rgyud yongs su ma smin pa yang yongs su smin par byed do //
T06TD4038.2E:59b-25: gzhi des mos pa mang zhing bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:59b-26: de dag de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa nas /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-27: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bar du yang dag par 'grub mod kyi /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-28: 'on kyang skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa de la mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-29: don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid rnam pa gnyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pas /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-30: 'du byed thams cad la yang dag par skyo bar mi 'gyur /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-31: yang dag par 'dod chags dang bral bar mi 'gyur /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-32: yang dag par rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur zhing /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-33: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa las kyang yongs su grol bar mi 'gyur /
T06TD4038.2E:59b-34: las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa las kyang yongs su grol bar mi 'gyur /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-1: nyon mongs pa las kyang yongs su grol bar mi 'gyur bas /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dag la 'di lta ste /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-3: mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-4: don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las brtsams nas /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-5: 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad las yang dag par skyo bar bya ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-6: 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-7: rnam par grol bar bya ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-8: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-9: las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-10: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir chos ston to //
T06TD4038.2E:60a-11: de dag gis chos de thos nas gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid la brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mngon bar zhen pa med pas /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-12: skye bo ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-13: don dam pa nyid du mos par byed /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-14: rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-15: ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed cing /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-17: tha snyad btags pas yongs su ma bsgos pa'i shes pa tha snyad btags pa dang rjes su 'brel ba med cing /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-18: tha snyad btags pa bag la nyal ba med pa'i shes pa gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid de tshe 'di la shes pa'i stobs skyed pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-19: phyi ma la rgyu yang dag par chad pas 'gog par byed de /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-20: gzhi des 'du byed thams cad la yang dag par skyo ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-21: yang dag par 'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-22: yang dag par rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhing ;
T06TD4038.2E:60a-23: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-24: las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-25: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa las kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:60a-26: don dam yang dag 'phags de la sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs can rnams kyis kyang lam 'di nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-27: bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyis grub pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-28: bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur la /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-29: sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs can rnams dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs can rnams kyis kyang lam 'di nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-0: bsgrub pa 'di nyid @60b kyis grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur bas /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'i lam gcig pa yin la /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-4: rnam par dag pa yang gcig ste /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-5: gnyis pa gang yang med pas /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-6: ngas de las dgongs nas theg pa gcig tu bstan te /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-7: sems can gyi khams na sems can rang bzhin gyis dbang po rtul ba rnams dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-9: dbang po rnon po rnams kyi rigs sna tshogs dag kyang med pa ni ma yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:60b-10: don dam yang dag 'phags nyan thos kyi rigs kyi gang zag zhi ba'i bgrod pa gcig pu pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad brtson pa dang ldan par gyur kyang /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-11: byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byar mi nus so //
T06TD4038.2E:60b-13: 'di ltar de ni snying rje shin tu chung ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-14: sdug bsngal gyis shin tu 'jigs pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis rigs dman pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-15: de ji lta ji ltar snying rje shin tu chung ba de bzhin du sems can gyi don bya ba la shin tu mi phyogs par 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:60b-16: ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis shin tu 'jigs pa de bzhin du 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad la shin tu mi phyogs par 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:60b-17: sems can gyi don bya ba la shin tu mi phyogs pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-18: 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad la shin tu mi phyogs pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngas ma bstan te /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-19: de'i phyir zhi ba'i bgrod pa gcig pu pa zhes bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:60b-20: nyan thos byang chub tu yongs su 'gyur ba de gang yin pa de ni ngas rnam grangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' yin par bstan te /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-21: 'di ltar de ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol nas /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskul na shes bya'i sgrib pa las sems rnam par grol bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T06TD4038.2E:60b-23: de ni dang por bdag gi don la sbyor ba'i rnam pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol te /
T06TD4038.2E:60b-24: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos kyi rigs su 'dogs so //
T06TD4038.2E:61a-0: don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar nga'i @61a * //
T06TD4038.2E:61a-1: chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa shin tu gya nom pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-2: bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ston pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-3: chos legs par bstan pa la ni sems can rnams kyi mos pa'i rim pa yang snang ste /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-4: don dam yang dag 'phags 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa nyid rnam pa gsum po de dag nyid las dgongs nas drang ba'i don gyi mdo brjod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta ste /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-5: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-6: chos thams cad ma skyes pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-9: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes chos ston to //
T06TD4038.2E:61a-10: de la sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-11: sgrib pa yongs su dag pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-14: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yang dag par grub pa de dag gis ni chos de thos na /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-15: nga'i dgongs te bshad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-16: chos de la yang mos par 'gyur la /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-17: don de yang shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur zhing de rtogs pa goms pas kyang myur ba myur ba kho nar shin tu mthar thug pa de nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur te /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-18: nga la yang aa la la bcom ldan 'das de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-19: des ni chos thams cad legs par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dad pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:61a-20: de la sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-21: sgrib pa yongs su dag pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-22: rgyud yongs su smin pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-23: mos pa chen po ma yin pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-24: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yang dag par ma grub pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-25: drang po drang po'i rang bzhin can /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-26: rtog pa sel mi nus pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-27: rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin par mi gnas pa de dag gis ni chos de thos na ngas dgongs te bshad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes mod kyi /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-28: 'on kyang chos de la mos par byed cing dad pa yang 'thob ste /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-29: mdo sde 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61a-31: zab par snang ba stong pa nyid dang ldan pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-2: rtog ge pa'i spyod pa ma yin pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-3: zhib mo brtags pa mkhas pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-4: mdzangs pas rig pa yin no zhes mos par byed do //
T06TD4038.2E:61b-5: mdo sde de dag gi don bstan pa dag la bdag mi shes so snyam nas 'dug ste /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-6: 'di skad ces sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni zab /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-7: chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyang zab ste /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen gyi /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-9: bdag cag gis ni je mi shes so //
T06TD4038.2E:61b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni sems can rnams la mos pa sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa yin te /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mkhyen pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-12: gzigs pa mtha' yas pa yin /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-13: bdag cag gis shes pa dang mthong ba ni ba lang gi rjes tsam mo snyam nas /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-14: de dag mdo sde de rnams la gus par byas te /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-16: yi ger bris nas 'chang bar yang byed /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-18: yang dag par 'gyed par yang byed /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-22: kha ton du yang byed mod kyi /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-23: 'di ltar nga'i dgongs te bshad pa zab mo 'di ma rtogs pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i rnam par sbyor bar mi nus so //
T06TD4038.2E:61b-24: de dag gzhi des na bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis kyang 'phel bar 'gyur /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-25: ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kyang 'phel bar 'gyur la /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-26: gang du yang rgyud yongs su ma smin pa dag kyang smin par byed do //
T06TD4038.2E:61b-27: ji ste sems can de dag las sems can gang dag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i bar du yang dag par grub pa ma yin la /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-28: drang po drang po'i rang bzhin can ni ma yin mod kyi /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-29: 'on kyang rtog pa sel nus pa /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-30: rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin par gnas pa de dag gis ni chos de thos na /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-31: nga'i dgongs te bshad pa zab mo yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes te /
T06TD4038.2E:61b-32: chos de la mos kyang chos 'di dag thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa kho na yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:61b-33: chos 'di dag thams cad ni ma skyes pa kho na'o //
T06TD4038.2E:61b-35: gzod ma nas zhi ba kho na'o //
T06TD4038.2E:61b-36: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa kho na'o zhes chos kyi don la sgra ji bzhin kho nar mngon par zhen par byed de /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-1: na chos thams cad la med par lta ba dang mtshan nyid med par lta ba 'thob par 'gyur te /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-3: mtshan nyid med par lta ba thob nas kyang thams cad la mtshan nyid thams cad kyis skur ba 'debs te /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-4: chos rnams kyi kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid la yang skur ba 'debs /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-5: chos rnams kyi gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-6: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid la yang skur ba 'debs so //
T06TD4038.2E:62a-8: don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yod na ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu shes par 'gyur na /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-9: de la gang dag gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-10: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid la mtshan nyid med par mthong ba de dag gis ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid la yang skur ba btab pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-11: de lta bas na de dag ni mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum char la yang skur ba 'debs pa zhes bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:62a-12: de dag ni nga'i chos chos la chos su 'du shes pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-13: don ma yin pa la don du 'du shes pa yin te /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-14: nga'i chos la chos su 'du shes pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-15: don ma yin pa la don du 'du shes pa de dag chos la yang chos su 'dzin don ma yin pa la don du 'dzin to //
T06TD4038.2E:62a-16: de dag chos la mos pas dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel mod kyi /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-17: 'on kyang don dam pa ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pas shes rab las yongs su nyams pa yin te /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-18: shes rab las yongs su nyams na /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-19: dge ba'i chos shin tu rgya che ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-20: shin tu dpag tu med pa rnams las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:62a-21: gzhan dag de dag las chos la chos su dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-22: don ma yin pa la don du thos nas /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-23: gang dag lta ba la dga' bar byed pa de dag ni chos la chos su 'du shes pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-24: don ma yin pa la don du 'du shes pas /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-25: chos la chos su shes pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-26: don ma yin pa don du mngon par zhen par 'gyur te /
T06TD4038.2E:62a-27: de dag kyang gzhi des na de bzhin du dge ba'i chos las yongs su nyams par rig par bya'o //
T06TD4038.2E:62b-0: gang dag lta ba'i rjes su dga' bar mi byed pa de dag las chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med pa nyid thos @62b shing /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-1: chos rnams kyi skye ba med pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-3: gzod ma nas zhi ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-4: rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thos nas skrag cing dngang la /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-6: 'di skad ces 'di ni sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das kyi bka' ma yin gyi /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-7: 'di ni bdud kyis smras pa yin no zhes kyang zer zhing /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-8: de ltar rig nas mdo sde de dag la skur ba 'debs par byed /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-10: mi bsngags pa rjod par byed /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-11: ngan du rjod par byed de /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-12: gzhi des na phongs pa chen po thob par 'gyur zhing /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-13: las kyi sgrib pa chen pos kyang reg par 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:62b-14: gzhi des kyang gang dag skye bo phal po che la las kyi sgrib pa chen po 'thob pas slu bar byed pa /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-15: mtshan nyid thams cad med par lta zhing don ma yin pa don du ston par byed pa de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa rgya chen po dang ldan par nga smra'o //
T06TD4038.2E:62b-16: don dam yang dag 'phags de la sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-17: sgrib pa yongs su ma dag / rgyud yongs su ma smin /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-19: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par ma grub cing drang po ma yin la drang po'i rang bzhin can ma yin yang /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-21: rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin par gnas pa de dag gis ni chos de thos na /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-22: nga'i dgongs te bshad pa yang /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-23: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mi shes shing /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-24: chos de la mos par yang mi 'gyur la /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-25: de dag chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes shing /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-26: don la don ma yin par 'du shes la /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-27: chos la yang chos ma yin pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-28: don la yang don ma yin par mngon par zhen nas /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-29: 'di skad ces 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin gyi /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-30: 'di ni bdud kyis smras pa yin no zhes kyang zer zhing /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-31: de ltar rig nas mdo sde de dag la skur ba 'debs par byed /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-33: mi bsngags pa rjod par byed /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-34: ngan du rjod par byed cing lhad kyang 'jug par byed de /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-35: rnam grangs du mar mdo sde de dag spang ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-37: rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir zhugs shing /
T06TD4038.2E:62b-38: de la mos pa'i gang zag rnams la yang dgrar 'du shes par 'gyur ro //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-1: dang po nyid nas kyang las kyi sgrib pa bsgribs pa yin la /
T06TD4038.2E:63a-2: gzhi des kyang las kyi sgrib pa de lta bus sgrib par byed de /
T06TD4038.2E:63a-3: las kyi sgrib pa de'i dang po ni gdags par sla'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 'di snyed kyi bar gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gdags par dka'o //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-4: don dam yang dag 'phags de ltar na nga'i chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa /
T06TD4038.2E:63a-6: bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ston pa /
T06TD4038.2E:63a-7: chos legs par bstan pa la /
T06TD4038.2E:63a-8: sems can rnams kyi mos pa'i rim pa de lta bu dag kyang snang ngo //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-10: chos rnams ngo bo nyid med chos rnams ma skyes dang /
T06TD4038.2E:63a-11: chos rnams ma 'gags chos rnams gzod nas zhi ba dang //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-12: chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin mya ngan 'das par ni //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-13: dgongs pa med par mkhas pa su zhig smra bar byed //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-14: mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med skye ba ngo bo med //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-15: don dam ngo bo nyid med do zhes ngas bshad do //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-16: 'di la mkhas pa gang zhig dgongs pa shes pa ni //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-17: rab tu nyams par 'gyur ba'i lam du de mi 'gro //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-18: kun gyi rnam dag lam ni gcig pu 'di yin te //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-19: rnam par dag pa'ang gcig ste gnyis pa gang yang med //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-20: de phyir theg pa gcig pa 'di ni 'dogs byed kyang //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-21: sems can rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs med ma yin //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-22: sems can khams 'di na ni gang dag bdag gcig pu //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-23: mya ngan 'da' bar byed pa'i sems can dpag tu med //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-24: gang dag mya ngan 'das kyang sems can mi gtong ba'i //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-25: bstan pa snying rje ldan pa de dag shin tu dkon //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-26: gang grol de dag rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i dbyings //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-27: phra zhing bsam gyis mi khyab mnyam zhing bye brag med //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-28: thams cad don grub sdug bsngal nyon mongs spangs pa ste //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-29: gnyis su brjod pa ma yin bde zhing brtan pa yin //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-30: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la /
T06TD4038.2E:63a-31: byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
T06TD4038.2E:63a-32: bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs te gsungs pa /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-5: mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:63b-6: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba'i don bdag gis 'di ltar 'tshal te /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-7: rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-9: gzugs kyi phung po zhes ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-10: bye brag gi mtshan nyid du ming dang brdar rnam par gzhag pa dang gzugs kyi phung po skye'o zhe'am /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-12: gzugs kyi phung po spang ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-13: yongs su shes pa zhes ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-14: bye brag gi mtshan nyid kyi gnas 'du byed kyi mtshan ma gang lags pa de ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid lags te /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-15: de la brten nas bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dogs par mdzad lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:63b-16: rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-17: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma gang lags pa de ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:63b-18: de la brten nas bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi skye ba ngo bo de ma mchis pa nyid dang /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-19: de las cig shos don dam pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid kyang 'dogs par mdzad lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:63b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'di ltar 'tshal te /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-21: rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-22: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma de nyid kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid der yongs su ma grub cing ngo bo nyid de kho nas ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid chos la bdag ma mchis pa /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-23: de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang lags pa de ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid lags te /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-24: de la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-25: de las cig shos don dam pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid las gcig 'dogs par mdzad lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:63b-26: gzugs kyi phung po ji lta ba bzhin du /
T06TD4038.2E:63b-27: phung po lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:64a-0: phung po rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du skye mched bcu gnyis po dag gi skye mched re re la yang de bzhin du lags @64a * //
T06TD4038.2E:64a-2: srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi srid pa'i yan lag re re la yang de bzhin lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:64a-3: zas bzhi po dag gi zas re re la yang de bzhin lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:64a-5: khams bco brgyad po dag gi khams re re la yang de bzhin lags so //
T06TD4038.2E:64a-6: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba'i don bdag gis 'di ltar 'tshal te /
T06TD4038.2E:64a-7: rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas /
T06TD4038.2E:64a-8: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /

T06TD4038.2E:65a-22: chab mar bstsal na shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba lags so //

T06TD4038.2E:65b-7: don dam yang dag 'phags khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs te bshad pa shes te /

T06TD4038.2E:65b-15: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par bstan pas chos kyi 'khor lo ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba /

T06TD4038.2E:65b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de yang bla na mchis pa /

T06TD4038.2E:66a-28: rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams dpag tu med ;

T06TD4038.2E:66a-34: brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas //
T06TD4038.2E:66a-42: ba lang gi rjes kyi chu ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu dang bsgrun na /
T06TD4038.2E:66a-43: brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
T06TD4038.2E:66b-0: @66b rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //

T06TD4038.2E:66b-4: bsgom pa'i rnam pas sbyor ba las yang dag par grub pa'i bar gyi bsod nams 'di dang bsgrun na /

T06TD4038.2E:66b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T06TD4038.2E:66b-12: don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ni don dam pa nges pa'i don bstan pa yin te /
T06TD4038.2E:66b-13: 'di ni don dam pa nges pa'i don bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig / don dam pa nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di bshad pa na /
T06TD4038.2E:66b-14: srog chags drug 'bum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
T06TD4038.2E:66b-15: nyan thos sum 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go //
T06TD4038.2E:66b-16: nyan thos 'bum lnga khri ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
T06TD4038.2E:66b-17: byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to zhes gsungs so /
T06TD4038.2E:66b-19: // / bam po sum cu dgu pa /

T06TD4038.2E:66b-22: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhu ba zhus pa /
T06TD4038.2E:66b-23: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i ci la gnas /
T06TD4038.2E:66b-25: theg pa chen po la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom par bgyid lags //
T06TD4038.2E:67a-2: byams pa chos gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T06TD4038.2E:67a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam mi gtong ba la gnas shing brten nas so //
T06TD4038.2E:67a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi gnas dang /
T06TD4038.2E:67a-5: lhag mthong gi dmigs pa'i dngos po bzhi po 'di lta ste /
T06TD4038.2E:67a-6: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan dang /
T06TD4038.2E:67a-7: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan dang /
T06TD4038.2E:67a-9: dgongs pa yongs su grub pa zhes gang dag bstan pa de la /

T06TD4038.2E:67a-14: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan no //

T06TD4038.2E:67a-18: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan no //
T06TD4038.2E:67a-19: du zhig de gnyi ga'i dmigs pa lags /
T06TD4038.2E:67a-24: dgos pa yongs su grub pa'o //

T06TD4038.2E:67a-26: ji ltar zhi gnas yongs su tshol bar bgyi ba dang /
T06TD4038.2E:67a-27: lhag mthong la mkhas pa lags //

T06TD4038.2E:67a-31: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /

T06TD4038.2E:67a-34: ched du brjod pa'i sde dang ;

T06TD4038.2E:67a-39: shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /

T06TD4038.2E:67b-0: ji ltar legs par bsams pa'i chos de dang nyid @67b yid la byed cing /

T06TD4038.2E:67b-5: de la lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /

T06TD4038.2E:67b-10: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan de dag la shes bya'i don de rnam par 'byed pa dang /

T06TD4038.2E:67b-19: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong la mkhas pa yin no //
T06TD4038.2E:67b-20: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ji srid du sems la dmigs pa'i sems nang du yid la bgyid pa na ;
